trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the shift parameter mask constants in Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: Fornece constantes para compatibilidade com o turno constantes de máscara de parâmetro no Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, shift parameter mask constants were used to represent the state of modifier keys in the `Shift` parameter of various key and mouse event handlers.
trans-unit.target: No Visual Basic 6.0, constantes de máscara de parâmetro shift foram usados para representar o estado de teclas modificadoras no `Shift` parâmetro de vários manipuladores de eventos de mouse e chave.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the parameters for key and mouse events have changed, and these constants are no longer necessary.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], alterou os parâmetros para eventos de mouse e de chave e constantes não são mais necessários.

trans-unit.source: These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.
trans-unit.target: Constantes permitem que o código que foi atualizado do Visual Basic 6.0 para continuar a ser executados sem modificações adicionais.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funções e objetos no <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>namespace são fornecidos para uso pelas ferramentas de atualização do Visual Basic 6.0 para [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, essas funções e objetos duplicam a funcionalidade que você pode encontrar em outros namespaces no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.
trans-unit.target: Eles são necessários apenas quando o modelo de código do Visual Basic 6.0 difere significativamente da implementação do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbAltMask" name="vbAltMask" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente a constante do Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbAltMask" name="vbAltMask" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbCtrlMask" name="vbCtrlMask" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente a constante do Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbCtrlMask" name="vbCtrlMask" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbShiftMask" name="vbShiftMask" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente a constante do Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbShiftMask" name="vbShiftMask" href=""> </xref>.
